trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The vellso has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The vellso has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
text: The vellso's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Spider Climb
text: The vellso can climb surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The vellso makes two attacks. one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (3d8) necrotic damage and contract the carrion curse disease (see sidebar).

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
